Articles.Content: Does anyone know how or if I can get the KSP cursor as my personal cursor?

> 
> Does anyone know how or if I can get the KSP cursor as my personal cursor?

It's likely buried in the game files... It's possible Squad might sell it as a downloadable item later on- but currently I don't think it's easily accessible. 

It also might be a common asset and therefore not open to sale I independently. So it all depends.

> 
> It's likely buried in the game files... It's possible Squad might sell it as a downloadable item later on- but currently I don't think it's easily accessible. 
> It also might be a common asset and therefore not open to sale I independently. So it all depends.

I looked all through the files and couldn't find anything, was just hoping that it was hidden somewhere I wouldn't think of

- - - Updated - - -

Thanks for moving it, wasn't quite sure where to ask this

Maybe you could try screenshotting it and cropping it and all that stuff, then set it as your personal cursor through some sort of program ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Maybe you could try screenshotting it and cropping it and all that stuff, then set it as your personal cursor through some sort of program ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sounds like something that could be done, just not by me.....

> 
> I looked all through the files and couldn't find anything, was just hoping that it was hidden somewhere I wouldn't think of
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Thanks for moving it, wasn't quite sure where to ask this

It may be buried in the unity game engine file- files that without specific software can't be read. So it's in there- you just get access to it without using unity or some reader program that specifically states that it can read unity files.
